logic_summary: Added V5 encounter (Post-gentamicin follow-up) based on Section 33.7 Outcome, including VOG results and reported symptoms.
Added 'SOT': 'Normal' to V2 CDP numeric results to explicitly address the remark about missing results, as the text states CDP was normal except for COG.

history.present_illness: Patient reported further decline in balance following second gentamicin injection.
history.otologic_history: Difficulty in open spaces, climbing bleachers, walking and looking around, stumbling in the dark, navigating narrow walkways.

tests.name: Video-oculography (VOG)
tests.key_findings: Leftward beating post-headshake nystagmus; no change in caloric symmetry but decreased total eye speed; rightward beating hyperventilation nystagmus.

numeric_results.Caloric_Response: Symmetry unchanged; Total eye speed decreased
